  <script>
    // 30초 카운트다운 + 하양 -> 빨강 배경 보정
    const total = 30;
    let remain = total;
    const timerEl = document.getElementById('timer');
    const verite = document.getElementById('veriteBtn');

    const fmt = s => {
      const m = Math.floor(s/60), r = Math.floor(s%60);
      return String(m).padStart(2,'0') + ':' + String(Math.max(0,r)).padStart(2,'0');
    };

    let last = performance.now();
    function step(ts){
      const dt = (ts - last) / 1000; last = ts;
      remain -= dt;
      if (remain < 0) remain = 0;

      // 배경색: progress 0(하양) → 1(강한 빨강)
      const progress = Math.min(1, (total - remain) / total);
      const l = 100 - 50*progress; // 100%(white) -> 50%
      const s = 0 + 100*progress;   // 0% -> 100%
      document.body.style.backgroundColor = `hsl(0 ${s}% ${l}%)`;

      // 타이머 텍스트
      timerEl.textContent = fmt(remain);
      if (remain <= 10) timerEl.classList.add('danger');

      // 종료 시 Vérité 버튼 등장
      if (remain <= 0){
        verite.classList.add('show');
        return;
      }
      requestAnimationFrame(step);
    }
    requestAnimationFrame(step);
  </script>
